column4: (She looks at you and giggles.)  Did you annoy one of the teachers?
(She looks at you and giggles.)  Did you annoy one of the teachers?
(She gives you a curious look.)  Aren't you cold?  Go get some clothes before a teacher comes.
Hello fellow student.  I hope you're doing well.
Hello there.  Welcome to the college.
I'm DialogCharacterName.  I study in the college.
I'm waiting for my bus.
You should wear your uniform then.  They won't let you in without it.
Absolutely.  Just beep security, they will open the gate for you.
I don't think they will let you in dressed like that.

column3: Can I use the tennis court?
column4: Sure, you're already dressed up to play.

column3: Can I use the tennis court?
column4: You can, but only if you're wearing a tennis outfit and some sneakers.
Sure.  What would you like to know?
(She takes a step back.)  What?  Are you some kind of pervert?
It's a girl only college.  So there's only women, both students and teachers.
My family is paying so I'm not sure.  I've heard that it's pretty expensive.
Students have to wear ties, a skirt like mine and high leg socks.  Also, nothing too exotic will be accepted.
Yeah, both the buildings and teaching methods are outdated.  It's very strict.
Why are you asking me that?  Sure, go inside and get to your classes.
You could register for the next semester if you have the required papers.  It's in a few months.
No problem.  Is there anything else you need?
(She frowns.)  Yeah, alright.  Is there anything else you need?

column3: I'm serious.  I want to tie you up.
column4: (She pushes you back.)  No!  I don't know you!  Go away now or I'll call security.
Go away!  I'm not speaking with you anymore.
